mapper.sql: id, teacher, student, srtpName, srtpDescription, apllication, midCheck, complete, `status`, cost
mapper.insert: insert into srtpmanager (id, teacher, student, srtpName, srtpDescription, apllication, midCheck, complete, `status`, cost) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teacher,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{student,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srtpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srtpdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apllication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midcheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
insert into srtpmanager
id,

student,

midCheck,

update srtpmanager
teacher = #{teacher,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student = #{student,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
srtpName = #{srtpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
srtpDescription = #{srtpdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

complete = #{complete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update srtpmanager set teacher = #{teacher,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student = #{student,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, srtpName = #{srtpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, srtpDescription = #{srtpdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apllication = #{apllication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCheck = #{midcheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complete = #{complete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

from srtpmanager where student LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentId},'%')
